Mezhdurechensk (Russian: Междуреченск: It was established in 1948 and granted town status in 1955.Aeroflot Flight 593 crashed near the city in 1994.
Victory Day celebrations were cancelled in the city after the nearby Raspadskaya mine explosion killed 91 people in 2010.
